law.catch_line: The county commissioners shall, within thirty days after the approval of the petition and report, ca...
law.text: The county commissioners shall, within thirty days after the approval of the petition and report, call together the owners of all land within the public watershed association for the purpose of electing a board of directors and determining their rate of compensation. The county commissioners shall give at least ten days' notice of the meeting by notices posted at four public places within the watershed association or in the vicinity thereof, stating the time, place, and object of the meeting. Each such landowner shall be entitled to vote in such election.
